select r.id as id, is_payed, user_id, r.created_at as created_at, payment_deadline , reservation_num, status_enum, airline, arrival_city, departure_airport, departure_city , flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time from reservation_tb as r join ticket_tb as t on r.id = t.reservation_id where user_id = #{userId} and status_enum = #{statusEnum}
and is_payed = 'true'
